About Us

BIO SHINE CO.,LTD. established since 2013 focus on feed additives. The company is the cooperation of marketers and animal feed specialists with collective experiences of more than 20 years. We offer alternative to the industry by focusing on customer-centric and continue to develop every aspects of feed additive market together with partners, suppliers and customers as well as relevant organizations. We have experience in pet industry, feed ingredients industry as well as feed mills and integrated farm for both terrestrial and aquatic animals.

A brief History of Bio Shine

2024

To be Professional team in the market, 1st choice for customer solutions.
2022

Digital transformation and innovation.

2020

Focus on natural value to industries feed, food, pet food,

plant nutrition, and entry to South East Asia market.

2016

Bio Shine’s branding and expand to food additives market.
2013

Established, start up with feed additives trading activity.
